column2: "Iyi nye EWURADZE n'asɛm a ɔbaa Petuel ba Joel hɔ no."

column4: na hom asaase do atsefo nyina
column5: hom nyɛ aso. Aso iyi bi aba da wɔ hom nda mu

column2: "Hom nka ho asɛm nkyerɛ hom mba
column3: na hom mba nka nkyerɛ hɔn mba
column4: na hɔn so hɔn mba nka nkyerɛ mbasantsen a odzi do."

column3: abɛbɛw edzi; na dza abɛbɛw gyae no
column4: konyinko edzi; na konyinko ndzikaase no

column3: hom nnyan na hom nsu; na hom nsanomfo nyina

column2: "Na ɔman bi etu aba m'asaase do
column4: na hɔn dodow nnyi ano; hɔn se tse dɛ gyata se
column5: na wɔwɔ gyata kɛse ne nyepi se."

column3: na ɔawaawaa m'adɔmbadua ho: ɔapɔr ho ahon egu
column4: na ɔatow akyen; n'abaw ho ayɛ sakosako."

column2: "Twa ewuo dɛ ɔbaabun a ofura eyitam ma ne nkataasiaber mu kun."
"Woetwa edziban afɔr na ɔnom afɔr efi EWURADZE fie; asɔfo

column3: asaase ridzi nkɔmbɔ; na eburow asɛɛ

column6: wɔ ewifua na atoko no ntsi; na haban mu ndɔbaa no ahera."
mekyerɛ haban mu ndua nyinara akyenkyen; osiandɛ enyigye ho ato wɔ adasamba mu."

column3: hom mfa eyitam mbɔ hom ho do
column4: na hom nka mbɔɔ; afɔrmbukyia ho asomfo
column5: hom ntwa ewuo; hom me Nyankopɔn n'asomfo
column6: hom mbra mbɛda eyitam mu anadwe yi nyina: na edziban afɔr na ɔnom afɔr egyaa wɔ hom Nyankopɔn fie ba."

column4: hom mboa mpanyimfo na asaase no do atsefo nyina ano mbra EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn fie
column5: na hom nsu ntɔ EWURADZE do."

column2: "Ao da no a! Na EWURADZE ne da no abɛn
column3: na ɔbɛba dɛ ɔsɛɛ a ofi otumfo no ne nkyɛn."
ana enyigye na ahosɛpɛw mmfii hɛn Nyankopɔn fie?"

column2: "Aba aprɔw n'akɔfi ase; mputu adeda apanapan
"Mbrɛ mbowa dua si apen a! Anyɛmbowakuw reberɛ

column3: ɔwo na musu frɛ wo: na ogya ahyew sar do edzidzimbea
column4: na ogyaframee ahyew hamu ndua nyinara."

column3: hambowa rehaahaw kyerɛ wo: osiandɛ nsu nwora nyina awewew
column4: na ogya ahyew sar do edzidzimbea."
